comment.summary: Make a directory recursively if it doesn't exist.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Forcably remove a directory recursively.
 *
 * @param path - Path to the directory to remove.
 */

params.name: path
params.description: Path to the directory to remove.

comment.summary: Convert Windows paths to POSIX paths.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Get a list of all files in a directory
 *
 * @param cwd - the directory to walk
 *
 * @param dirs - whether to include directories in the result
 */
comment.summary: Get a list of all files in a directory

params.name: dirs
params.description: whether to include directories in the result
